main.title: Atlas 500 AI Edge Station
main.text: This industry-leading edge product integrates AI processing capabilities and supports 16-channel HD video processing in the size of an STB, delivering a 4x performance over existing products in the marketplace.
bottomTip1: Move the mouse to rotate the model
bottomTip2: Move the mouse to move the model
bottomTip3: Move the mouse to zoom in or out the model
info: Intelligent edge</br>• Industry-leading edge products that integrate AI processing capabilities</br>• Fitting into -40°C to +70°C outdoor scenarios without fans for heat dissipation</br>Large energy in small body</br>• 16-channel HD video processing capability delivered in an STB-size box</br>• Performance improved by 4 times compared with similar products</br>Edge-cloud synergy</br>• Collaboration with the private or public cloud, which pushes APPs and updates algorithms</br>• Unified device management and firmware upgrade on the cloud
